attributes.action: All new homes built in the UK to have Swift Nesting Bricks installed.
attributes.additional_details: Swift nest bricks provide safe, artificial nesting sites in buildings where natural cavities are lacking due to modern construction. By offering secure places to breed, they support higher breeding success and help stabilise or increase local Swift populations.
attributes.background: To impose a law that all new builds in the UK (homes and businesses) to have Swift Nesting Bricks installed to help increase the Swift population.
